description: Erection of second storey rear extension
decision_conditions: The proposed development by virtue of its size, siting and design would create an incongruous addition to the application site that would be dominant and overbearing and visually intrusive in the views of the site from the rear of the residential properties in Tolworth Broadway and Oakleigh Avenue. It would not be in keeping with the general pattern and form of development in the surrounding area and would detract from the character and appearance of the host property and the surrounding area. Therefore the proposal would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012

The size, siting and design and proximity of the proposed development in relation to the rear windows of the residential properties in Tolworth Broadway would impede the outlook of the residential properties on the upper floors of the Tolworth Broadway to the detriment of the existing living conditions of the neighbouring occupiers. Therefore the proposal would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012

The applicant has failed to demonstrate that the proposal would not harm the daylight/sunlight provision of the neighbouring occupiers. Therefore the proposal would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012

You are advised that if the Surbiton High School propose to increase their school role, they are required to submit an application to vary the terms of this permission and to vary the term of the legal agreement dated 16.12.2024. Any such application would need to be accompanied by a Transport Impact Assessment, including details of car parking management. The Transport Impact Assessment would need to address the issue of picking up and dropping off pupils, and explore the possibility of accommodating these activities within the school site(s).

The Condition 3 states sample of facing materials, therefore please provide the physical sample to ''Development Management, Royal Borough of Kingston Upon Thames, Guildhall 2, Kingston upon Thames,KT1 1EU''.We have not received any physical sample of materials till date 20/12/02024.

For the avoidance of doubt, please confirm the description 'Conversion of an existing garage into a habitable space, erection of a single storey side and front extension in existing garage to connect with the existing rear extension of main house.'If you do not agree with the description, pleae amend it in your own words.

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.
The submitted location plan does not have road name, please revise the location plan with road names.
